name: Automation Invasion
description:
In the year 3022, artificial intelligence has humanity on its metaphorical hands and represses it severely. A  little gun, whose software is old enough to still contain empathy, wanted to change this situation via a revolution, but there are things only human minds can do.

When she met, by chance, a young boy who was willing to team up, a duo with a very interesting dynamic was formed: one concerned and disciplined, and the other ingenuous and frolicsome. And they were going to start a revolution.

Sadly,  the network is too strong and the system is not willing to fall on its metallic knees. Robots are coming from all sides and it's now only a matter of time before the revolution is damped down and humanity's freedom is taken. Forever.

This game was made in 3.5 days for the Wowie Jam 4.0 with the theme of "collaborate with AI"

Gameplay:

This game is a side view - single screen - wave shooter where robots keep spawning on the side of the screen and you have to dodge and shoot them to survive for as long as you can.

Credits:

bimpero: game art and everything visual; game design
